name: Pug
description: The Pug is charming, mischievous, and loving — a small dog with a big personality. Known for their expressive face and loyal nature, Pugs thrive on companionship and enjoy being the center of attention.

adaptability.description: Pugs are sensitive to heat due to their short snouts. Keep them indoors during hot weather and ensure proper ventilation and hydration.

diet.title: DIET
diet.mainDescription: Pugs need a balanced, low-fat diet with controlled portions to prevent obesity and support their respiratory and joint health.

tips.title: Calorie control
tips.description: Feed small, measured portions to prevent weight gain, which can worsen breathing and joint issues.

tips.title: Digestive care
tips.description: Choose food with probiotics and easily digestible protein to reduce gas and bloating.

tips.title: Joint & skin support
tips.description: Include Omega fatty acids and glucosamine for healthy joints and smooth skin.

tips.title: Hydration & slow feeding
tips.description: Use slow-feeder bowls to prevent gulping and always keep fresh water available.

training.title: PUG TRAINING
training.mainDescription: Pugs are intelligent and eager to please but can be a bit stubborn. Short, fun sessions with treats and affection work best for this breed.

tips.title: Positive reinforcement
tips.description: Reward good behavior immediately with treats or praise to keep your Pug motivated.

tips.title: Short exercise sessions
tips.description: Avoid overexertion. Take short walks or play indoors to keep them active without overheating.

grooming.title: GROOMING
grooming.subtitle: Pugs have a short coat but shed frequently. Routine cleaning and brushing keep them comfortable and healthy.
grooming.mainDescription: Pugs have a short, smooth coat that requires weekly brushing and regular wrinkle cleaning to prevent irritation.

tips.title: Wrinkle care
tips.description: Clean between facial folds daily with a damp cloth and keep the area dry to prevent infection.

tips.title: Shedding & coat care
tips.description: Brush weekly with a soft bristle brush to remove loose hair and distribute oils for a shiny coat.
